00079     {
00080         $this->_instanceName = $langFile;
00081

00083         
00084         if( !file_exists( $this->_langFilePath ) ) {
00085             
00086             throw new tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception(
00087                 'Language file not found (' . $langFile . ')',

00090         }
00091         
00092         try {
00093             
00094             $xml = simplexml_load_file( $this->_langFilePath );
00095             
00096             foreach( $xml->data->languageKey as $langSection ) {
00097                 
00098                 $this->_labels[ ( string )$langSection[ 'index' ] ] = array();
00099                 
00100                 foreach( $langSection as $label ) {
00101                     
00102                     $this->_labels[ ( string )$langSection[ 'index' ] ][ ( string )$label[ 'index' ] ] = ( string )$label;
00103                 }
00104             }
00105             
00106         } catch( Exception $e ) {
00107             
00108             throw new tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception(
00109                 $e->getMessage(),
00110                 tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception::EXCEPTION_BAD_XML
00111             );
00112         }

00167     {

00169             
00170             return $this->_labels[ $this->_currentLang ][ $name ];
00171             
00172         } elseif( isset( $this->_labels[ 'default' ][ $name ] ) ) {
00173             
00174             return $this->_labels[ 'default' ][ $name ];
00175             
00176         } elseif( $this->_instanceName != self::$_defaultInstanceName
00177                   && $label = self::$_instances[ self::$_defaultInstanceName ]->$name
00178         ) {
00179             
00180             return $label;
00181             
00182         } else {
00183             
00184             return '[LABEL: ' . $name . ']';
